team_0170_head_teacher_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Ah, here you are, M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(000A)]
team_0170_head_teacher_02:
I wanted to thank you for all your hard work in
resolving the situation with Team Star.[VAR 0114(000A)]
team_0170_head_teacher_03:
If not for you, I suspect I would have done the
team a grievous injustice in my choice of\r
punishment for their actions.[VAR 0114(000A)]
team_0170_head_teacher_06: Ah, Miss Penny! Do come in.[VAR 0114(000A)]
team_0170_botan_02:
About the STCs... I’d like to work on them
together with the rest of Team Star.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0170_head_teacher_07:
That’s wonderful news. Thank you very much
for your favorable response.[VAR 0114(000A)]
team_0170_head_teacher_08:
But, um...I...I should be punished more heavily
than the others, I think...[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0170_head_teacher_09: Why so? Because of Operation Starfall?[VAR 0114(000A)]
team_0170_botan_03:
No, not that. Because of the other really bad
thing I did...[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0170_botan_04:
Um... Y’know the LP I gave you both in exchange
for helping me with Operation Starfall...?[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0170_botan_05:
I got hold of it sort of...illegally...by hacking the
Pokémon League’s LP management system.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0170_head_teacher_11: Ah. I see. That is...quite the revelation.[VAR 0114(000A)]
team_0170_head_teacher_12:
I did not think such a thing was even possible
in the first place.[VAR 0114(000A)]
team_0170_botan_06:
It wasn’t all that har— Errr, I mean...I’m really
sorry and I won’t do it again.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0170_head_teacher_13:
Hmm. This matter is rather out of my jurisdiction,
I’m afraid.[VAR 0114(000A)]
team_0170_head_teacher_15:
I will have to consult Ms. Geeta, the Pokémon
League chairwoman, on how best to proceed.[VAR 0114(000A)]
team_0170_head_teacher_14:
[VAR BD06(0000)]I do apologize, M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss
[VAR TRNAME(0000)],\r
but\r
I\r
will\r
have\r
to\r
ask\r
you\r
to\r
give\r
us\r
some privacy.[VAR 0114(000A)]
